Class_Quest_Name_Sweet Dreams Are Made o: Sweet Dreams Are Made of Peace
Class_Skill_Desc_Apex Arrow: Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Blast Arrow Ready</br>Duration: 20s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Frontliner's March</br>Frontliner's March Effect: Reduces your weaponskill cast time and recast time by 10%, and increases damage dealt by self and all party members within a radius of 30 yalms by 5%</br>Duration: 30s</br>This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.</br>※Action changes to Blast Arrow while under the effect of Blast Arrow Ready.
Class_Skill_Desc_Arm's Length: Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.</br>Duration: 6s</br>Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Army's Paeon: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Army's Paeon to self and all party members within 50 yalms, increasing direct hit rate by 3%</br>Duration: 45s</br>Additional Effect: 80% chance to grant Repertoire</br>Repertoire Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 4%</br>Can be stacked up to 4 times.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Army's Coda//
Class_Skill_Desc_Barrage: Triples the number of strikes for a single-target weaponskill. Additional effects added only once.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Additional Effect: Increases the potency of Shadowbite to 270</br>//Additional Effect: Grants Straight Shot Ready</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Battle Voice: Increases direct hit rate of self and all nearby party members by 20%.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Blast Arrow: Delivers an attack with a potency of 10,000 to all enemies in a straight line before you.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Frontliner's Forte</br>Frontliner's Forte Effect: Reduces your weaponskill cast time and recast time by 10%, and increases damage dealt by self and all party members within a radius of 30 yalms by 5%</br>Duration: 10s</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Bloodletter: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110.</br>Maximum Charges: 3</br>Shares a recast timer with Rain of Death.
Class_Skill_Desc_Burst Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 220.</br>Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Caustic Bite: Delivers an attack with a potency of 150.</br>Additional Effect: Poison</br>Potency: 20</br>Duration: 45s</br>Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Empyreal Arrow: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 3,000.</br>Consumes all charges upon execution, each charge adding an additional strike to the attack.</br>Maximum Charges: 3
Class_Skill_Desc_Final Fantasia: Reduces your weaponskill cast time and recast time by 10% while also increasing movement speed by 25%.</br>Additional Effect: Increases damage dealt by self and all party members within a radius of 30 yalms by 10% while also gradually filling the limit gauge</br>Duration: 30s</br>Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.</br>Gauge Charge Time: 120s</br>Can only be executed while in combat.
Class_Skill_Desc_Foot Graze: Binds target.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Cancels auto-attack upon execution.</br>Target unbound if damage taken.
Class_Skill_Desc_Head Graze: Interrupts the use of a target's action.
Class_Skill_Desc_Heavy Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.</br>Additional Effect: 20% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready</br>Duration: 30s/</br>Additional Effect: 20% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Iron Jaws: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: If the target is suffering from a Caustic Bite or Stormbite/Venomous Bite or Windbite effect inflicted by you, the effect timer is reset</br>Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Ladonsbite: Delivers an attack with a potency of 130 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Shadowbite Ready</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Skill_Desc_Mage's Ballad: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Mage's Ballad to self and all party members within 50 yalms, increasing damage dealt by 1%</br>Duration: 45s</br>Additional Effect: 80% chance to grant Repertoire</br>Repertoire Effect: Reduces the recast time of Bloodletter and Rain of Death/ by 7.5s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Mage's Coda//
Class_Skill_Desc_Nature's Minne: Increases HP recovery via healing actions by 15% for self and nearby party members.</br>Duration: 15s
Class_Skill_Desc_Peloton: Increases movement speed of self and nearby party members.</br>Duration: 30s</br>Effect ends when enmity is generated. Has no effect in battle.
Class_Skill_Desc_Pitch Perfect: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Potency increases up to 8,000 the farther away you are from the target, reaching its maximum value when the target is 15 yalms away.</br>Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Empyreal Arrow by 5s</br>Can only be executed while under the effect of Repertoire.</br>※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
Class_Skill_Desc_Powerful Shot: Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Potency increases up to 6,000 the further you are from the target, reaching its maximum value when the target is 15 yalms away.</br>Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Empyreal Arrow by 5s</br>Requires casting time to execute. However, it is possible to walk while casting.
Class_Skill_Desc_Quick Nock: Delivers an attack with a potency of 110 to all enemies in a cone before you.</br>Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Shadowbite Ready</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Radiant Finale: Increases damage dealt by self and nearby party members.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effectiveness is determined by the number of different Coda active in the Song Gauge.</br>1 Coda: 2%</br>2 Coda: 4%</br>3 Coda: 6%</br>Can only be executed when at least 1 coda is active.
Class_Skill_Desc_Rain of Death: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Maximum Charges: 3</br>Shares a recast timer with Bloodletter.
Class_Skill_Desc_Refulgent Arrow: Delivers an attack with a potency of 280.</br>Can only be executed when Straight Shot Ready.
Class_Skill_Desc_Repelling Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.</br>Additional Effect: 10-yalm backstep</br>Additional Effect: Bind</br>Duration: 3s</br>Cannot be executed while bound.
Class_Skill_Desc_Shadowbite: Delivers an attack with a potency of 170 to target and all enemies nearby it.</br>Barrage Potency: 270</br>Can only be executed when Shadowbite Ready.
Class_Skill_Desc_Sidewinder: Delivers an attack with a potency of 320.
Class_Skill_Desc_Silent Nocturne: Silences target.</br>Duration: 2s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Repertoire</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Powerful Shot changes to Pitch Perfect while under the effect of Repertoire.
Class_Skill_Desc_Stormbite: Deals wind damage with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Wind damage over time</br>Potency: 25</br>Duration: 45s</br>Additional Effect: 35% chance of becoming Straight Shot Ready</br>Duration: 30s//
Class_Skill_Desc_Straight Shot: Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.</br>Can only be executed when Straight Shot Ready.
Class_Skill_Desc_Troubadour: Reduces damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.</br>Duration: 15s</br>Effect cannot be stacked with machinist's Tactician or dancer's Shield Samba.
Class_Skill_Desc_Venomous Bite: Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Venom</br>Potency: 15</br>Duration: 45s
Class_Skill_Desc_Windbite: Deals wind damage with a potency of 60.</br>Additional Effect: Wind damage over time</br>Potency: 20</br>Duration: 45s
Class_Skill_Desc_the Wanderer's Minuet: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100.</br>Additional Effect: Grants the Wanderer's Minuet to self and all party members within 50 yalms, increasing critical hit rate by 2%</br>Duration: 45s</br>Additional Effect: 80% chance to grant Repertoire</br>Repertoire Effect: Allows execution of Pitch Perfect</br>Can be stacked up to 3 times.</br>Additional Effect: Grants Wanderer's Coda//</br>※Action changes to Pitch Perfect upon execution.
Class_Skill_Desc_the Warden's Paean: Removes one status affliction from self or target party member that can be removed by Purify. If a status affliction cannot be removed, creates a barrier that will nullify the next status affliction that can be removed by Purify.</br>Duration: 8s</br>Grants Warden's Grace upon successfully removing or nullifying a status affliction.</br>Warden's Grace Effect: Reduces damage taken by 25% while increasing HP recovered by healing actions by 25%</br>Duration: 5s</br>Additional Effect: Grants Repertoire</br>Duration: 10s</br>※Powerful Shot changes to Pitch Perfect while under the effect of Repertoire.
Class_Status_Desc_Arm's Length: Damage taken is reduced. Impervious to the next stun, sleep, bind, heavy, silence, knockback, or draw-in effect.
Class_Status_Desc_Caustic Bite: Toxins are causing damage over time.
Class_Status_Desc_Final Fantasia: Weaponskill cast and recast times are reduced while increasing movement speed. Increasing damage dealt by self and nearby party members while also gradually filling the limit gauge.
Class_Status_Desc_Nature's Minne: HP recovery via healing actions is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Repelling Shot: Damage dealt by weaponskills is increased.
Class_Status_Desc_Stormbite: Wounds are exposed to the elements, causing damage over time.
Class_Trait_Desc_Bite Mastery: Upgrades Venomous Bite and Windbite to Caustic Bite and Stormbite respectively.
Class_Trait_Desc_Bite Mastery II: Adds to Stormbite, Caustic Bite, and Iron Jaws a 35% chance that you will become Straight Shot Ready.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Apex Arrow: Grants Blast Arrow Ready upon executing Apex Arrow after the Soul Voice Gauge has reached 80 or higher.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Apex Arrow becomes Blast Arrow while under this effect.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Army's Paeon: While under the effect of Army's Paeon with at least one stack of Repertoire, singing Mage's Ballad or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant Army's Muse, reducing weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay.</br>Duration: 10s</br>Allowing the effect of Army's Paeon and accumulated stacks of Repertoire to expire without singing Mage's Ballad or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant Army's Ethos. </br>Duration: 30s</br>While under the effect of Army's Ethos, singing Mage's Ballad or the Wanderer's Minuet will grant Army's Muse. Both Army's Ethos and Army's Muse require stacks of Repertoire, the number of which will determine the potency of the latter.</br>1 Repertoire:  1%</br>2 Repertoire:  2%</br>3 Repertoire:  4%</br>4 Repertoire:  12%
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Bloodletter: Allows a third charge of Bloodletter and Rain of Death.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Empyreal Arrow: Guarantees the trigger of the additional effects for current Mage's Ballad, Army's Paeon, and the Wanderer's Minuet when Empyreal Arrow hits a target.
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Quick Nock: Adds to Quick Nock a 35% chance that you will become Shadowbite Ready.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Enhanced Troubadour: Reduces Troubadour recast time to 90 seconds.
Class_Trait_Desc_Heavier Shot: Adds to Heavy Shot a 20% chance that you will become Straight Shot Ready.</br>Duration: 30s
Class_Trait_Desc_Heavy Shot Mastery: Upgrades Heavy Shot to Burst Shot.
Class_Trait_Desc_Minstrel's Coda: Grants Mage's Coda, Army's Coda, or Wanderer's Coda upon singing Mage's Ballad, Army's Paeon, or the Wanderer's Minuet respectively.
Class_Trait_Desc_Soul Voice: Increases Soul Voice Gauge by 5 each time Repertoire is granted.
Class_Trait_Desc_Straight Shot Mastery: Upgrades Straight Shot to Refulgent Arrow.
